articles.author: Harshita Tyagi
articles.title: Nifty, Sensex rise on buying in auto & metals; investors await US Fed meet outcome - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Global cues were positive as Wall Street's three major indices ended in the green with S&P 500 closing at a fresh record high. Asia markets were also trading higher.
articles.content: Benchmark indices Nifty and Sensex rose on March 20 thanks to buying in auto and metals stocks. According to analysts, the market is likely to see high volatility as investors may remain cautious ahe… [+2262 chars]
